price: ¿Es que vas a consumirte [de tanto pesar] porque [tu gente] se niegan a creer?
arabic: لَعَلَّكَ بَٰخِعٞ نَّفۡسَكَ أَلَّا يَكُونُواْ مُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: laʿallaka bākhiʿun nafsaka allā yakūnū mu'minīna
